languages.text: "Отсутствие связи с флагманом заставляет меня нервничать... надеюсь, звездную гавань удержат до нашего прибытия".
"The lack of communication with the flagship is making me uneasy... I hope the starport will hold until we arrive."
languages.original_text: "Отсутствие связи с флагманом заставляет меня нервничать... надеюсь, звездную гавань удержат до нашего прибытия".

traits.locale_text: "The lack of communication with the flagship is making me uneasy... I hope the starport will hold until we arrive."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The lack of communication with the flagship is making me uneasy... I hope the starport will hold until we arrive."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The lack of communication with the flagship is making me uneasy... I hope the starport will hold until we arrive."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The lack of communication with the flagship is making me uneasy... I hope the starport will hold until we arrive."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “与旗舰的通讯中断了，这让我很不安……我希望那座星港能撑到我们抵达。”
languages.original_text: "The lack of communication with the flagship is making me uneasy... I hope the starport will hold until we arrive."

traits.locale_text: “与旗舰的通讯中断了，这让我很不安……我希望那座星港能撑到我们抵达。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Quelle plaie de ne pas réussir à communiquer avec le vaisseau amiral... J'espère que l'astroport tiendra jusqu'à notre arrivée. »
languages.original_text: "The lack of communication with the flagship is making me uneasy... I hope the starport will hold until we arrive."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle plaie de ne pas réussir à communiquer avec le vaisseau amiral... J'espère que l'astroport tiendra jusqu'à notre arrivée. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Der Mangel an Kommunikation mit dem Flaggschiff macht mich unruhig ... Ich hoffe, der Raumhafen hält, bis wir eintreffen."
languages.original_text: "The lack of communication with the flagship is making me uneasy... I hope the starport will hold until we arrive."

traits.locale_text: "Der Mangel an Kommunikation mit dem Flaggschiff macht mich unruhig ... Ich hoffe, der Raumhafen hält, bis wir eintreffen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「旗艦との通信ができないというのが不安です…私たちが向かうまでスターポートが持ちこたえてくれるといいのですが」
languages.original_text: "The lack of communication with the flagship is making me uneasy... I hope the starport will hold until we arrive."

traits.locale_text: 「旗艦との通信ができないというのが不安です…私たちが向かうまでスターポートが持ちこたえてくれるといいのですが」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «La falta de comunicaciones con la nave insignia me preocupa... Espero que el puerto estelar aguante hasta que lleguemos».
languages.original_text: "The lack of communication with the flagship is making me uneasy... I hope the starport will hold until we arrive."

traits.locale_text: «La falta de comunicaciones con la nave insignia me preocupa... Espero que el puerto estelar aguante hasta que lleguemos».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "The lack of communication with the flagship is making me uneasy... I hope the starport will hold until we arrive."

languages.text: "Sancak gemisiyle iletişim kuramamamız endişe verici. Umarım biz varana kadar yıldız limanı düşmez."
languages.original_text: "The lack of communication with the flagship is making me uneasy... I hope the starport will hold until we arrive."

traits.locale_text: "Sancak gemisiyle iletişim kuramamamız endişe verici. Umarım biz varana kadar yıldız limanı düşmez."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
